note: Semi-retired web developer, former law firm JOAT employee for 26 years; tech, code, design, data, and OS enthusiast. Dabbled in community activism and volunteerism, but am too introverted to understand mean & nasty people. Vegetarian/Vegan. I follow politics only for survival & to vote out ass clowns. I hate patriarchy in all its forms and will fight for the rights of women, children, animals, and all minorities with my entire being. FAFO.
